Description:
Family Home In A Growing Estate.
Beautifully presented and kept stands this family home that will cater to all your needs. You will feel the comfort as soon as you walk in, with its delightful open plan living zone and its modern features.
A great investment opportunity with solid future growth. This property has great access onto Ballarat Road, Western Ring Road, Deer Park By-Pass & is close to Derrimut Shopping Plaza, the parks and the newly developed golf course.
Comprising:- 3 bedrooms with BIR's, master with full en-suite, open plan living, consisting of well equipped kitchen with stone benchtops , family and dining areas, modern bathroom, separate lounge & double remote garage..

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!!!
The home you have always dreamed of but can never find is now on the market. An absolute credit to its current owners this magnificent single storey residence provides everything you could ever wish for and more. At approximately 32 squares, its impressive size is matched by the huge number of standout features you are greeted with at every turn. Highlights include the sensational kitchen featuring Blanco 900mm appliances, glass splashback and Caesar stone benchtops, an amazing theatre/rumpus room, the enormous master suite with retreat area , WIR , double vanity & oversize shower ensuite and the gorgeous gardens complimented by 2 strategically positioned alfresco areas, one with extensive decking off the main living area and the other with water feature off the formal lounge and master bedroom encompassing all inside living spaces with the outside. Additional features include 3 more bedrooms with BIRs serviced by a quality central bathroom, open plan kitchen / dining / living area , huge side access with gate for a boat , trailer or caravan , ducted heating, evaporative cooling, security alarm system, high ceilings, down lights, feature walls, network cabling, established mature gardens with underground watering system, storage shed and double garage with remote and internal access. All this on a massive allotment of approximately 605sqm situated a few steps from magnificent Bothwell Park, schools, transport and all other amenities.
Insights: 12 Oakham Glade, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2015.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!!!
This property's striking facade will immediately impress but it is upon entering that you will truly appreciate what this immaculate residence offers with its gorgeous hardwood flooring, high ceilings and designer lighting being just a taste of what is to come. The sensational kitchen overlooks the dining and main living area and the size of the adjacent rumpus/ theatre room that leads to outside will just blow your mind. Sleeping quarters comprise master bedroom with WIR and ensuite and 3 additional bedrooms with BIRs serviced by another high quality bathroom. Moving outside you will be brought back to the good old days with the magnificent backyard featuring a huge concreted entertaining space complimented by a large grassed area for the kids to play and lovely mature gardens with the added bonus of possible side access for your toys by adding a crossover. Other features include separate formal lounge at the front of the property, 900mm stainless steel appliances and huge pantry in kitchen , ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, storage shed and double garage with remote. For those that like the finer things in life the time has come to spoil yourself.

Description:
A Stunning 5 Bedroom + Study with 780 sqm Land
Ideally located within short distance to schools, shops, parks, transport and the Sunshine golf course, this spacious family home is perfect for the growing family. Set on an impressive allotment of Approx 780 m2
and accommodating good sized bedrooms with built in robes (master with walk in robe and en-suite), study, 3 magnificent separate living areas including family, formal lounge and rumpus/theatre. This lovely north facing residence also features a substantial kitchen ideal for creating many culinary delights, large alfresco entertainment area leading into the large backyard with side access. Extra features include a wide U shape drive way, powder room, double garage, ducted heating, Evaporative cooling, security doors, high ceilings and much more for your convenience.
Call us today to arrange for your inspection.

Description:
The Pinnacle of Perfection (1606sm land)
Grand in Nature and faultless in its location, if the best of everything is your way of life, you've just found your new home. Delivering flawless standards in modern luxury, this stunning as new residence is designed for today's needs and offers the ultimate in superior family living. Utterly irresistible from the moment you step inside, this pristine residence is in a class of its own and will appeal to those who demand the best in quality design, finishes and lifestyle.
Exquisitely stylish, yet still entirely approachable in a way that makes everyday family life a joy, this is a home that's built for excellence and longevity for the growing family (including those with multi-generational living requirements )
For those with an understanding of how a family's needs can change over time, the combination of 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, should provide peace of mind for many years to come. Indeed, the parent's suite along with its spa ensuite, dressing room and exclusive views capturing the parklands and beyond is a private haven that makes leaving the room a particularly difficult decision.
Keen entertainers will find a choice of four distinct living zones, catering for every possible occasion from a celebratory dinner party to beer & pizza with friends over a game of pool, (and everything in between). As for relaxed everyday living, there's ample room for every family member to find some space of their own when they need it and wonderful spaces to gather in at any time.
Additional to the practical family living, the external accommodation with a large 16 square (approx) tradesman's shed, which can shelter 6 Cars plus extensive additional guest parking and potential to run a business from home (STCA) and all within 20 minutes of the CBD.
If you've been waiting for something truly exceptional with the largest residential block in Derrimut, your inspection of 1A Hammerwood Ave Derrimut awaits.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!!!
This quality Porter Davis ex display home incorporates Derrimuts finest location overlooking a magnificent recreation reserve, with every imaginable formal and informal entertaining space making this residence an entertainers dream. The massive garage measuring almost 6 squares allows plenty of storage and opens up the possibility of running your business from home as plumbing and a split system are already fitted. Masterfully designed the kitchen overlooks the living, meals and rumpus area and flows out to the lovely alfresco. Four large bedrooms, master with park views and double shower ensuite, central bathroom, separate lounge, formal dining and study complete the home. Other features include high ceilings, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, quality window furnishings including plantation shutters and much more. All this on an enormous allotment of approximately 663sqm. Your dream home awaits.

Description:
Convenient Living Near All Amenities
Tastefully designed and comfortably configured throughout, this unit is a stable investment option or an enticing entry point into the area. Set at the rear of the complex and built with intent of enjoying the finer things in life with less time spent in the low maintenance gardens and leaving room to entertain. Conveniently located within a short walk to Derrimut Village and even closer to public transport for easy living. This property consists of 2 bedrooms, central bathroom, modern kitchen - meals and living area all opening to the rear court yard. This is a must to go on your short list of properties to inspect, you won't regret it.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & STEVE JUSUP!!!
On a great sized allotment ( 555sqm approx. ) allowing you to easily stroll to schools, transport, parks, community centre and new proposed shops is this great Derrimut property. Very spacious in design the home comprises 3 great sized bedrooms , master with WIR and huge double vanity ,oversize shower ensuite, 2 huge living areas and a large kitchen with stainless steel appliances and heaps of bench and cupboard space that overlooks the dining area. Other features include 2 sets of sliding doors to the alfresco ( one from the dining area the other from the main living room) and rear yard, ducted heating , ceiling fans, brand new carpets , walls freshly painted , double garage with remote and room to add a rear roller door for access to the rear and a long driveway that can accommodate multiple vehicles. An affordable opportunity right in heart of Derrimut awaits.
Insights: 17 Palmer Parade, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2015.

Description:
SOLD BY STEVE JUSUP & NICK MAKROGLOU!!!
Stockdale Leggo Real Estate proudly present another magnificent Metricon residence. The home comprises 4 spacious bedrooms with BIRs, the master with WIR and oversize shower ensuite. A sensational kitchen featuring stone benches, glass splashback and stainless steel appliances overlooks the dining and huge living area that spills out to the lovely alfresco area and large backyard space. Other features include kids retreat or second living area, ducted heating, stone benches in bathrooms, down lights, beautifully landscaped front and rear gardens and double remote garage with internal access. All this on a large allotment of approximately 512sqm in a quiet owner occupied pocket surrounded by other quality properties. Inspection highly recommended.
Insights: 49 Pembroke Crescent, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2014.
